杭州万锂达新能源科技有限公司

invention-title: Preparation method of lithium fluorosulfonate concentrated solution
一种氟磺酸锂浓缩液的制造方法

abstract.p: The invention relates to the field of additives of lithium ion battery electrolytes, in particular to a preparation method of a lithium fluorosulfonate concentrated solution, which comprises the following steps: (1) reacting chlorosulfonic acid with lithium fluoride in a non-aqueous solvent to generate lithium fluorosulfonate, and reacting to generate hydrogen chloride gas; and (2) decompressing and degassing the reaction solution, completely removing residual gases such as hydrogen chloride in the solution, and filtering to remove contained insoluble substances such as lithium fluoride. The inventor adopts chlorosulfonic acid and lithium fluoride to react to prepare lithium fluorosulfonate, and chlorosulfonic acid belongs to a bulk raw material and is easy to obtain as a raw material. In addition, other side reaction problems do not exist in the reaction process, and the generated product is single. And the obtained product is very high in purity and yield, and is very suitable for large-scale production in the industry for preparing the electrolyte of the lithium battery.

本发明涉及锂离子电池电解液的添加剂领域，具体涉及一种氟磺酸锂浓缩液的制造方法，包括以下步骤：(1)将氯磺酸与氟化锂在非水溶剂中反应生成氟磺酸锂，反应产生氯化氢气体；(2)将上述反应液进行减压脱气，除尽溶液中残留的氯化氢等气体，再经过滤除去内含的不溶物氟化锂等。本发明人采用氯磺酸与氟化锂进行反应而制备氟磺酸锂，氯磺酸属于大宗原料，作为原料而言容易获取。另外，在反应过程中不存在其他副反应问题，并且生成产物单一。得到的产品的纯度和收率非常高，非常适合在制备锂电池的电解液的工业上放大生产。
